name: Benny and The Jetts
description:
A Top Cat Fan Game:

Set in 1969 during  the height of the Hippie movement,  Top Cat's gang member Benny  the ball runs into another gang of cats called The Jetts. Overtime he learns about the counterculture life and begins to bond with the members of the gang.  Will he stay with this new gang or does his loyalty still lie with T.C?

Top Cat is copyright 2020 Warner Brothers\Turner\Hanna-Barbera Productions\The Cartoon Network, This project is no way assoicated with Warner Brothers, Hanna-Barbera, Turner, or any other company that owns the rights to Top Cat.
